sn23.11:2.1: 2. Dutiyamāravagga
sn23.11:4.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn23.11:4.5: “Rūpaṃ kho, rādha, māro, vedanā māro, saññā māro, saṅkhārā māro, viññāṇaṃ māro.
sn23.11:4.6: Evaṃ passaṃ, rādha, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi nibbindati, saññāyapi nibbindati, saṅkhāresupi nibbindati, viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati.
sn23.11:4.10: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
